title: How to work on cell phones - Quora

response.answer_text: I would first tell you to be prepared to fail. I've worked with electronics for over 50 yrs. That includes much time spent repairing consumer electronics. I bought the tools and accoutrements necessary to disassemble and repair phones. Tried it twice and failed twice. One of the times I killed the phone. I took one to a “professional” and it them 3 tries to get it right.
You need will training and certification before any company will consider you for a position. Here is a start. Student Solutions | Cellular Repair School
